entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
